openclawAutomationPackage.description: openclaw-automation-kit installed locally from official repo/tag (`pip install -e .`)

repoRoot.description: OPENCLAW_AUTOMATION_ROOT points to a trusted repo checkout (optional if running from repo root)

setupInstructions: 1. Clone openclaw-automation-kit from the official repository and check out a tagged release.
2. Create venv and install deps: pip install -r requirements-dev.txt && pip install -e .
3. Optionally set OPENCLAW_AUTOMATION_ROOT to the repo path.
5. Configure OpenClaw to require confirmation for credentialed/state-changing runs.
6. Test skill: python skills/openclaw-web-automation/scripts/run_query.py --query "Check yahoo.com and tell me the top headlines"
